Subject: Re: The Otyebis' Worldwide Message

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Various Otyebis Crewmembers:





The Infecticon transmission was recieved and the location of hte base was 
recorded into the main computer's library as the satellites began deep probes 
of Iron Raptor's Maximal base and the Infecticon warship.

A slithery sounding voice sent a reply transmission to the source of the 
Infecticon transmission.  

"Thank you, Commander Frostbite.  The IGL thanks the Infecticons for having 
the bravery to entering our trying tournaments, being the first faction to 
enter into the Regular League and the Gestalt League.  We respect your wishes 
to prepare inside the Otyebis and we have many civilian facilities for such 
things."

"Please wait..." the snake-like voice halted for a moment as it searched the 
database for the term, "one mega-cycle, or one Terran hour, before arriving.  
We were not prepared for guests.  And good luck."
